title: Men`s Fitness (UK) Mar 2012

Our March issue is packed full of fitness tips and money-saving ideas. In our comprehensive home workout for the cash-strapped we'll show you how to use a broomstick to improve your mobility, strengthen your core with a flufy pillow and build a mighty back with a tea towel.
